WorkItem.Description:
In the latest version of PHPExcel (1.7.6), the percentage number format does not respect the thousands and decimal separator. The code starts in PHPExcel_Style_NumberFormat::toFormattedString on line 581.
 
sprintf is used to build the final value but a number_format should be used in order to implement the thousands and decimal values.
 
Should be fairly easy to fix.
WorkItem.Summary: Percentage Format doesn't respect thousands and decimal separator
